titleStmt.title: The Duke of Tyrconnel's speech to the garrison and magistrates of the city of Lymerick, upon their late debates, for the surrender of the said place.
titleStmt.author: Tyrconnel, Richard Talbot, Earl of, 1630-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Lymerick, for A. Weston: and re-printed at London, from the original,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: in a tightly bound volume with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Christ Church (University of Oxford) Library.
